Text: Don't bother. The Portable doesn't allow you to save the database, which means it has to rebuild each time you open it. Worthless.  The other version here doesn't have a crack or serial.  Also worthless.  Better to use the Laxity version http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5090518/AllMySongs_Database_v1.1_WinAll-LAXiTY_[BeLLBoY]

@gasman364
The license name and code are in the readme.txt file. The GAOTD Setup obviously works in the day of submission only, but the other setup is working also today. The Portable version has been built using Thinstall and it should write with no problems on your PC, even if I haven't tested it wery much yet.
